listitem.para: Marks the items in the contents list for stepping. Whenever a stepped procedure is invoked, each instruction line in the procedure body is displayed in a dialog box before being executed and MSWLogo waits for the user to press the OK button before continuing. A dialog box is displayed whenever a stepped variable name is "shadowed". A variable is shadowed when a variable of the same name is created with the LOCAL command or when a procedure is invoked that inputs a parameter with the same name.
See the Workspace Queries section for an explaination of the contentslist parameter.
You can step all procedures and variables with the Step Button.

programlisting.userinput:
TO MYPROG FD 10 RT 90 FD 20 LT 90 END
MYPROG STEP "MYPROG
programlisting.replaceable: Each line of MYPROG will be displayed and will wait for OK to continue to next line.
